Tag.description: A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

properties.name: Key
properties.description: The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

type.description: The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

properties.name: Value
properties.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 0 to 256 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

type.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 0 to 256 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

properties.name: LoadBalancerName
properties.description: The name of your load balancer.

type.description: The name of your load balancer.

properties.name: InstancePort
properties.description: The instance port where you're creating your load balancer.

type.description: The instance port where you're creating your load balancer.

properties.name: IpAddressType
properties.description: The IP address type for the load balancer. The possible values are ipv4 for IPv4 only, and dualstack for IPv4 and IPv6. The default value is dualstack.

type.description: The IP address type for the load balancer. The possible values are ipv4 for IPv4 only, and dualstack for IPv4 and IPv6. The default value is dualstack.

properties.name: AttachedInstances
properties.description: The names of the instances attached to the load balancer.

type.description: The names of the instances attached to the load balancer.

properties.name: HealthCheckPath
properties.description: The path you provided to perform the load balancer health check. If you didn't specify a health check path, Lightsail uses the root path of your website (e.g., "/").

type.description: The path you provided to perform the load balancer health check. If you didn't specify a health check path, Lightsail uses the root path of your website (e.g., "/").

properties.name: SessionStickinessEnabled
properties.description: Configuration option to enable session stickiness.

type.description: Configuration option to enable session stickiness.

properties.name: SessionStickinessLBCookieDurationSeconds
properties.description: Configuration option to adjust session stickiness cookie duration parameter.

type.description: Configuration option to adjust session stickiness cookie duration parameter.

properties.name: TlsPolicyName
properties.description: The name of the TLS policy to apply to the load balancer.

type.description: The name of the TLS policy to apply to the load balancer.

properties.name: Tags
properties.description: An array of key-value pairs to apply to this resource.

type.description: An array of key-value pairs to apply to this resource.
